org.locationtech.geowave.mapreduce.input

Class GeoWaveInputConfigurator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.locationtech.geowave.mapreduce.GeoWaveConfiguratorBase
      • org.locationtech.geowave.mapreduce.input.GeoWaveInputConfigurator

  • public class GeoWaveInputConfigurator
extends GeoWaveConfiguratorBase
    This class provides utility methods for accessing job context configuration parameters that are specific to the GeoWaveInputFormat.
